text: Raw signal intensities for each probe set were extracted from CEL files using RMA in R/Bioconductor (

version 2.13.2, released on 09/30/2011), and the affy package. MAS5.0 was used to assign P(resent) calls indicating reliable gene detection. ID_REF =  VALUE = Data are raw RMA signal intensities. These intensities are log(2) transformed values of the original hybridization signals.

protocol.text: The pab2 pab8 mutant allele (Dufresne J Gen Virol 89: 2339-2348 (2008)) in the Columbia ecotype was grown alongside wild type Arabidopsis thaliana. Four biological replicates were grown at different times.

Seedlings were grown on agar plates containing full strength Murashige and Skoog salts, pH 5.7, and 1% sucrose for 10-12 days in continuous light at 22oC. Fluorescent light intensity was 80micromole/m2/sec.

Aerial parts of seedlings were harvested. Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions. Polysomal and nonpolysomal/monosomal RNAs were isolated using sucrose density gradients according to Kim et al. Genome Biology 8:R60 (2007).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.
Following fragmentation, cRNA were hybridized to Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Arrays.
